titles.title: Providing Robust Organics and Diets for Urban Communities Everywhere Act
Providing Robust Organics and Diets for Urban Communities Everywhere Act
To amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to reauthorize the Office of Urban Agriculture and Innovative Production.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Providing Robust Organics and Diets for Urban Communities Everywhere Act or the PRODUCE Act
This bill extends through FY2028 the Department of Agriculture (USDA) Office of Urban Agriculture and Innovative Production, which coordinates across USDA agencies to update programs and engage with stakeholders to serve the needs of urban and innovative producers. The office also provides competitive grants to initiate or expand efforts of farmers, gardeners, citizens, government officials, schools, and other stakeholders in urban areas and suburbs.
